Hi There,

My name is Karol Orozco and I love digging into challenges and solving them with data-driven approaches. \
\
𝑰 𝒉𝒆𝒍𝒑 𝒐𝒓𝒈𝒂𝒏𝒊𝒛𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔 𝒆𝒎𝒃𝒓𝒂𝒄𝒆 𝑺𝒉𝒂𝒓𝒆𝒅 𝑽𝒂𝒍𝒖𝒆 𝒃𝒚 𝒑𝒐𝒔𝒊𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆𝒍𝒚 𝒊𝒎𝒑𝒂𝒄𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒔𝒐𝒄𝒊𝒆𝒕𝒚 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒆𝒏𝒗𝒊𝒓𝒐𝒏𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕. 𝑻𝒉𝒆 𝒔𝒘𝒆𝒆𝒕 𝒔𝒑𝒐𝒕 𝒘𝒉𝒆𝒓𝒆 𝑷𝒓𝒐𝒇𝒊𝒕 𝒎𝒆𝒆𝒕𝒔 𝑷𝒖𝒓𝒑𝒐𝒔𝒆:\
- Connect nonprofits and low-income populations with grants and other initiatives that reduce the economic burden and increase ridership on public transportation while reducing energy consumption and harmful carbon dioxide\
- Apply a social lens to business development opportunities by including diverse suppliers and minority communities in our supply chain (multicultural contracts)\
- Connect communities with transportation planners and leaders to improve the cluster by extending service limits and hours\
\
𝑰 𝒆𝒏𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒆 𝒄𝒖𝒍𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒂𝒍𝒍𝒚 𝒓𝒆𝒍𝒆𝒗𝒂𝒏𝒕 𝒅𝒂𝒕𝒂 𝒂𝒏𝒂𝒍𝒚𝒔𝒊𝒔 𝒃𝒚:\
-Translate data reports and business jargon into plain language in English and Spanish\
- Collect data by partnering with community-based, religious, or other organizations that work with members of the assessment's target communities\
- Engage community members as data collectors and meeting there where they are\
- Conduct key informant interviews with community leaders\
- Share early results with community stakeholders to validate findings, obtain candid feedback, and adjust the interpretation of data\
\
𝑰 𝒆𝒅𝒖𝒄𝒂𝒕𝒆, 𝒓𝒆𝒇𝒊𝒏𝒆 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒅𝒓𝒊𝒗𝒆 𝒎𝒚𝒔𝒆𝒍𝒇 𝒕𝒐 𝒃𝒆 𝒂 𝒃𝒆𝒕𝒕𝒆𝒓 𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒔𝒐𝒏 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒍𝒆𝒂𝒅𝒆𝒓:\

- I am constantly learning because I never settle\
- I build and encourage communication \
- I champion collaboration and diversity in teams\
- I offer and receive consistent feedback\

There is a real person behind this profile, too! I enjoy meeting new people and hearing new perspectives. Please feel free to reach out if you'd like to talk to me about Family, Culture, Data, Community, and Business.\
